privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: This Privacy Policy describes how Mono V2 collects, uses, and protects your information.

rights.access: The right to access your personal data
rights.rectification: The right to rectification of inaccurate data
rights.erasure: The right to erasure of your data

privacy.contact_questions: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.description: These Terms of Service govern your use of the Mono V2 platform and services.

use_services_rules.age: You must be at least 18 years old to use our services
use_services_rules.security: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account
use_services_rules.lawful: You agree not to use the service for any unlawful purpose
use_services_rules.interfere: You must not interfere with or disrupt the service

terms.contact_questions: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at:
terms.governing_law_text: These terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which Mono V2 operates.
terms.arbitration_text: Any disputes arising from these terms shall be resolved through binding arbitration in accordance with the rules of the American Arbitration Association.
terms.acceptance_text: By accessing and using the Mono V2 platform, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.
terms.acceptance_text2: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We do so by posting modified terms on this website. Your continued use of the service means you accept any changes.
terms.use_services_text: Our services are provided for your personal and non-commercial use. You may not use our services for any illegal or unauthorized purpose.
terms.intellectual_property_text: All content included on this site, such as text, graphics, logos, button icons, images, audio clips, digital downloads, data compilations, and software, is the property of Mono V2 or its content suppliers and protected by international copyright laws.
terms.intellectual_property_text2: The compilation of all content on this site is the exclusive property of Mono V2 and protected by international copyright laws.
terms.limitation_liability_text: In no event shall Mono V2, nor its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or affiliates, be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses.
terms.limitation_liability_text2: This limitation of liability applies to the fullest extent permitted by law in the applicable jurisdiction.
terms.termination_text: We may terminate or suspend your account and bar access to the service immediately, without prior notice or liability, under our sole discretion, for any reason whatsoever and without limitation.
terms.termination_text2: If you wish to terminate your account, you may simply discontinue using the service. All provisions of the terms which by their nature should survive termination shall survive termination.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.description: This Cookie Policy explains how Mono V2 uses cookies and similar technologies.
cookies.contact_questions: If you have any questions about our use of cookies, please contact us at:
cookies.what_cookies_description: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device when you visit our website. They help us provide you with a better experience by remembering your preferences and analyzing how you use our site.
cookies.how_use_description: We use cookies for several purposes, including:

how_use_list.personalized: To provide you with a personalized experience
how_use_list.analyze: To analyze how our website is used and improve its functionality
how_use_list.remember: To remember your preferences and settings
how_use_list.security: To provide security features and prevent fraud
how_use_list.advertising: To deliver relevant content and advertisements

cookies.essential_description: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly. They enable basic functions like page navigation and access to secure areas of the website.
cookies.functional_description: These cookies enable enhanced functionality and personalization, such as remembering your language preferences and user settings.
cookies.functional_examples: Examples: Language preference cookies, user interface customization
cookies.analytics_description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously.
cookies.analytics_examples: Examples: Google Analytics cookies, performance monitoring
cookies.marketing_description: These cookies are used to track visitors across websites to display relevant and engaging advertisements.
cookies.marketing_examples: Examples: Advertising cookies, social media cookies
cookies.manage_description: You can control and manage cookies in several ways:

manage_list.browser_settings: Browser Settings: Most browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings. You can usually find these settings in the "Options" or "Preferences" menu.
manage_list.cookie_consent: Cookie Consent: When you first visit our website, you can choose which types of cookies you want to accept.
manage_list.third_party_optout: Third-party Opt-out: For third-party cookies, you can often opt out directly through the third-party provider's website.

cookies.manage_note: Please note that disabling certain cookies may affect the functionality of our website and your user experience.

offline.title: You're Offline
offline.description: It looks like you've lost your internet connection. Don't worry, you can still access some features.
offline.check_connection: Check your internet connection and try refreshing the page.

page.title: Offline - Mono-v2
page.meta_description: You are currently offline. Please check your internet connection.
